text: Jisas takaw olap agak, Kanɨbtub awl ak, kɨli mɨgan ayaŋ amɨl pɨsnep kul gɨnɨgabal ak, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl mɨseŋ nɨŋɨd, kanɨb awl anɨb ak teplep agɨl, mɨdupsek mɨgan ayaŋ abal agak. Anɨb ak nɨbi nɨgtep gɨl, pel mɨdep kanɨbtub sɨkol ak dɨl mɨgan ayaŋ amnɨmɨb agak. Kanɨb sɨkol ak koslam ajɨpal agak. Binɨb nokom nokom nep, kanɨb sɨkol pal anɨb ak pɨyow nɨŋɨd abal agak.
